title: The Witcher 3 Wild Hunt Game of the Year Edition PROPER-GOG
description:
GOG 
PRESENTS

WITCHER 3 WILD HUNT GAME OF THE YEAR EDITION *PC*
(C) CD PROJEKT RED

Date: August 30, 2016
Game Type: Role-playing - Adventure - Fantasy
Language: English / (MULTi15) 
Protection: None [DRM-FREE]

Game Notes

The Witcher is a story-driven, next-generation open 
world role-playing game, set in a visually stunning 
fantasy universe, full of meaningful choices and 
impactful consequences. In The Witcher, you play as 
Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter tasked with finding 
a child from an ancient prophecy. 

System Requirements:

Windows: OS: 64-bit Windows 7 or 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1)
Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3 GHz or AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940
Memory: 6 GB RAM
Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
Hard Drive: 60 GB of available space 
DirectX: 11

For More Information: 
https://www.gog.com/game/the_witcher_3_wild_hunt_game_of_the_year_edition

Install Notes:

1. Start setup_witcher3_en_goty_2.0.0.51.exe
2. Install the game following the instructions of the installer.
3. Start patch_witcher3_ru_goty_2.0.0.51.exe (Optional)
4. Play

Notes:- Why Proper? Previously we did not included the 1.31 GOTY , 
CD PROJEKT just released GOTY with 1.30 first then they changed it 
to a new one with 1.31 without any seperate update as there is no 
main difference just an AIO installer and 1.31 incluisve Patch for 
some minor fixes, anyways this torrent Includes Base Game with ALL 
Expansions and ALL DLCs up to date and also Multi-language with 1.31 
Patch Exclusively. Installer is now in AIO (All In One), the game 
language default is English, if anybody needs Russian lang so they 
can Patch it with patch_witcher3_ru_goty_2.0.0.51.exe. If you guys 
need goodies or extra languages you can pick it up from my previous 
1.30 GOG torrent which is not GOTY Edition BlaBla...
